    Malta â€“ Gem of the Mediterranean

    Go Beyond Bathes in Spring Sunshine

    14th â€“ 21st March 2025

    What's to get excited about!

    Lying 90 kilometres to the south of Sicily and 300 kilometres north of Africa, Malta sits centrally in the Mediterranean sea. Being a naval strategic point, Malta and its smaller islands Gozo and Comino, have a rich and diverse history.

    So how best to discover this Maltese treasure then?

    Go Beyond has put together a travel experience that we think you will love. Our base will be the exotic QAWRA Palace Resort and Spa hotel. Equipped with three swimming pools, a spa and wellness centre and a restaurant, we think we have chosen the perfect accommodation to relax in.

    Plus, we have many activities that will get us out and about around the Maltese archipelago.

    We will take a boat trip around the Three Cities that are situated in the main harbour near Valletta. Jump on a ferry to Gozo relaxing on Ramla Beach, spend time visiting the town of Victoria and itâ€™s cittadella. We will take you on a Maltese food tour in the capital, Valletta, all those local tastes and smells will definitely excite your taste buds.

    Thereâ€™s a visit to the Popeye theme park, a kayak tour around the beautiful beaches and coast, a visit to the local aquarium and the fascinating classic car museum that exhibits over 100 classic cars. And of course, there will be a rest day, where you will have use of all three swimming pools!

    We canâ€™t wait to meet you in Malta â€“ new for 2025!

    Where you'll be staying...

    Overlooking Salina Bay, QAWRA Palace Resort & SPA has its own indoor and outdoor swimming pools. It also features a mini golf course and a games room with pool table.

    Each room features a private balcony with views of the bay or the internal courtyard and mini golf course. They are all air conditioned and come with a TV and fridge.

    Food, glorious food!

    There are four restaurants to choose from at the Qawra Palace Hotel. Each restaurant is themed with either Mediterranean, Asian, South American and Caribbean, plenty of choice.

    Breakfast at the Qawra Palace is buffet style and includes both sweet and savoury items such as eggs, sausages and cereal.

    What you'll experience...

    We will meet at a London airport and you will be supported on the flight to Valletta Airport in Malta. Our mini-buses will take you on the 40-minute drive to the hotel in St Pauls Bay.

    Your holiday will include the following:

  • 7 night, full board accommodation.
  • All entrance fees to all activities and sites.
  • Airport transfers and transport in and around Malta and Gozo.
  • Return flight from London to Malta, accompanied and supported by our Go Beyond team.
  • A ratio of 2 guests to 1 Go Beyond support staff member.
  • Support from our Go Beyond team during the holiday.

    • Accessiblility and Inclusion

    Inclusion is important to us so we strive, whenever possible, to make our holidays accessible to all.

    If you wish to discuss your specific access requirement for any of our holidays, please contact us at your earliest convenience and we will do everything we can to welcome you to the Go Beyond Holidays experience.
